title: Melissa Joan Hart And Amy Seimetz: Multi Multi-Hyphenates
description: Melissa Joan Hart shares what still scared her while remaking the film 'The Watcher in the Woods,' and Amy Seimetz tells us about adapting 'The Girlfriend Experience' into a format-breaking series.
